versos: (midwives) Exodus 1:15 - The king of Egypt said to the Hebrew midwives
(longer) "For my days vanish like smoke; my bones burn like glowing embers." - Psalm 102:3;;;
(daubed) Ezekiel 13:10 - "'Because they lead my people astray, saying, "Peace," when there is no peace, and because, when a flimsy wall is built, they cover it with whitewash,'";;;
(maidens) Psalm 68:25 - "The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after; among them were the maidens playing timbrels.";;;
(along) 2 Peter 2:15 - "They have left the straight way and wandered off to follow the way of Balaam son of Bezer, who loved the wages of wickedness.";;;
(spied) Numbers 13:25 - "At the end of forty days they returned from spying out the land.";;;
(helped) Psalm 118:13 - "I was pushed back and about to fall, but the Lord helped me.";;;
(groaning) Romans 8:26 - "In the same way, the Spirit helps us in our weakness. We do not know what we ought to pray for, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us through wordless groans.";;;
(shimei) 2 Samuel 16:5 - As King David approached Bahurim
(length) 2 Chronicles 3:3 - The length in the front of the temple of Solomon was sixty cubits.;;;

(horeb) Exodus 3:1 - "Now Moses was tending the flock of Jethro his father-in-law, the priest of Midian, and he led the flock to the far side of the wilderness and came to horeb, the mountain of God.";;;
(flame) "May no foul beast or fierce flame enter." -Baruch 6:31;;;
(bush) Exodus 3:2 - "There the angel of the Lord appeared to him in flames of fire from within a bush.";;;
(burned) "As the weeds are pulled up and burned in the fire, so it will be at the end of the age." - Matthew 13:40 NIV;;;
(shoes) Exodus 3:5: "Do not come any closer," God said. "Take off your sandals, for the place where you are standing is holy ground.";;;
(sorrows) Psalm 34:18 - "The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.";;;

(flowing) "And he said to me, 'This water flows toward the eastern region and goes down into the Arabah, and enters the sea; when the water flows into the sea, the water will become fresh.'" - Ezekiel 47:8;;;
